keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

# Remap d to <c-d> to better align with Vim.
unmap d
map <c-d> scrollPageDown

# Remap u to <c-u> to better align with Vim.
unmap u
map <c-u> scrollPageUp

# Hard reload.
map R reload hard

# Open a link in Incognito window
map I LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

# Allow passing pressed keys to webpage instead of Vimium.
map <m-]> passNextKey
